Interface HangingEntity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity
    All Known Subinterfaces:

extends Entity
    HangingEntity wrapper
    Author:
    Jason (darkdiplomat)

    • Method Detail

      • getHangingDirection

        int getHangingDirection()
        Gets the hanging direction of the HangingEntity
        Returns:
        0 for SOUTH; 1 for WEST; 2 for NORTH; 3 for EAST

      • setHangingDirection

        void setHangingDirection(int direction)
        Sets the hanging direction of the HangingEntity
        Parameters:
        direction - 0 for SOUTH; 1 for WEST; 2 for NORTH; 3 for EAST

      • isOnValidSurface

        boolean isOnValidSurface()
        Checks whether the HangingEntity is on a valid surface
        Returns:
        true if valid; false if not

      • getTickCounter

        int getTickCounter()
        Gets the current ticks the counter is at.
        When the counter reaches 100, validity checks are run.
        Returns:
        the current counter tick

      • setTickCounter

        void setTickCounter(int ticks)
        Sets the current ticks the counter is at.
        Parameters:
        ticks - the current ticks
